name: Quiz RPG: World of Mystic Wiz
name_original: Quiz RPG: World of Mystic Wiz
description:
The best-selling Quiz RPG finally in English!

Quiz RPG: The World of Mystic Wiz is one of a kind new game mixing Trivia and RPG! Answer questions while tackling quests and battle with other wizards in online tournaments!
Whether you are a RPG lover or just want to test your knowledge, this game will suit you, anywhere at anytime!

Download it for free with no registration and start building your team in no time!

Quiz RPG: The World of Mystic Wiz is a quiz/trivia card battle RPG, where you will answer questions while taking on quests. You assume the role of a wizard, completing tasks and investigating incidents while competing with other wizards in a bid to become a Master Wizard.

★ Very easy gameplay: Just select from categories such as Sports, Lifestyle, Science, or Geography, and if you answer correctly, your spirits (cards) will come to life and attack your enemies!

★ Enhance and Evolve your spirits (cards)!  Your spirits can have various Elements, Answer Skills, and Special Skills. You can strategically build your deck around those stats, and combine your spirits by Enhancing or Evolving them to make them more powerful. The game features over 400 beautiful spirits to collect! New cards to come with updates!

★ 15,000 trivia questions! Which makes it one of the biggest quiz/trivia apps content! Thousands of questions added regularly! You won’t run out of questions!

★ Multiplayer challenge: Battle with players from all over the word in online tournaments! Try to place highly and you will be rewarded with an in-game item! Go on quests alone, or with other players; the choice is up to you!

★ Play the game with your friends!  Follow your friends in-game, and have them follow you back! You can earn Friendship Pts by encouraging friends you follow. Use the Friendship Pts you've earned to invoke new spirits!
